I have gotten unrar errors or crc errors or dvd corruption BOTH times I've downloaded this. Anyone successful yet?

OK...... Finallly got it to crc right on abgx, couldnt verify since no rip yet. Failed burning at 88%  went ahead and tried synch and closing disc.... To my surprise not only does it WORK but I tried installing to hard drive and it went 100%!!! Musta just been random padding that didnt go.   So in short, YES IT WORKS but NOT STEALTHED.. I don't care since I'm banned anyway  lol  have fun guys.  And for those on the fence like I was, yeah this game actually IS better than the 1st. Videos looked like crap but the graphics are pretty good
